resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81998</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81998</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4292</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Business Abbreviations and Acronyms</string>
            <string language="es">Abreviaturas y acrónimos relacionadas con empresariales</string>
            <string language="ga">Giorrúcháin agus Acrainmneacha Gnó</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft Abkürzungen und Akronyme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Abréviations et acronymes d'affaires</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Abreviaturas e acrônimos do negócio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abbreviazioni ed acronimi di affari</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχειρησιακά συντμήσεις και αρκτικόλεξα</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Five short tests requiring students to define common business abbreviations and acronyms. Suggested solutions are provided. Useful revision aid.</string>
            <string language="es">Cinco tests breves que requieren que los estudiantes definan abreviaciones y acrónimos habituales relacionados con el mundo empresarial. Se ofrecen soluciones sugeridas. Útil ayuda para revisión.</string>
            <string language="ga">Cúig scrúdú gearr ina gcaitheann daltaí giorrúcháin agus acrainmneacha coiteanta gnó a shainmhíniú. Tugtar freagraí molta. Cabhair áisiúil le haghaidh dul siar.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business</string>
            <string language="es">Empresariales. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Gnó</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fünf kurze Tests, die Kursteilnehmer benötigen, 
geläufige Geschäft Abkürzungen und Akronyme zu definieren. 
Vorgeschlagene Lösungen werden zur Verfügung gestellt. 
Nützliches Änderunghilfsmittel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cinq essais courts exigeant des étudiants de 
définir des abréviations et des acronymes communs d'affaires. 
Des solutions suggérées sont fournies. Aide utile de 
révision.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cinco testes curtos que requerem estudantes 
definir abreviaturas e acrônimos comuns do negócio. As 
soluções sugeridas são fornecidas. Dae (dispositivo 
automático de entrada) útil da revisão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cinque prove corte che richiedono agli allievi di 
definire le abbreviazioni e gli acronimi comuni di affari. Le 
soluzioni suggerite sono fornite. Sussidio utile di revisione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πέντε σύντομες δοκιμές που απαιτούν τους σπουδαστές 
για να καθορίσει τις κοινά επιχειρησιακά συντμήσεις και τα 
αρκτικόλεξα. Οι προτεινόμενες λύσεις παρέχονται. 
Χρήσιμη ενίσχυση αναθεώρησης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commercio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχείρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4292</entry>
          </identifier>

        <educational>

          </intendedEndUserRole>

        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

            <value>discipline</value>
